questions.text: Sarah, a social worker in San Francisco, encounters a homeless veteran with PTSD who refuses to go to a shelter due to his mental health issues. How can the SF government better support individuals like him who have complex needs?

Mark, a small business owner in the Mission District, is struggling with homeless encampments blocking the entrance to his store, driving away customers. How should the SF government balance the needs of local businesses with those of the homeless population?
